transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan?

Executive: Hi sir, good morning. Pradeep ji se meri baat ho rahi hai?

Customer: Haan ji bilkul.

Executive: Pradeep ji, main actually IndiaMART office se baat kar rahi hu aapke account manager.

Customer: Achcha achcha, theek hai madam boliye.

Executive: Kaise hain sir aap?

Customer: Bas theek hai madam.

Executive: Sir actually na maine ek important update ke liye aapko connect kiya hai. Even kafi dino se main connect karne ki koshish kar rahi hu. Might be aap busy honge jiski vajah se aap mujhe connect nahi kar pa rahe hain. Sir aapka ye jo catalog registered hai na PK Traders.

Customer: Haan haan haan.

Executive: Haan, isme sir zero products active hain. Sare ke sare products aapne deactivate.

Customer: Hum hata diye hain. Hum sare ke sare product hata diye hain. Abhi humko thoda sa hum abhi setup kar rahe hain aur kuch dino mein main apna naya product launch karunga main.

Executive: Haan sir to matlab approximately kitna time lagega? Kyunki round about do mahine se aapki profile mein zero products pade hain. To iski vajah se na na to aapki listing hai na to visibility sab kuch zero ho rakha hai. Kyunki jab catalogs aur products hi nahi hai to kis vajah se aapke paas inquiries and leads aayengi. To yahi information aapko dena chah rahe the sir. To matlab problem ye hai ki sir aane wale kuch time mein fir ye problem hogi ki aapko business nahi aaya. To hum aapko isiliye aapko guide kar rahe hain sir ki aap bataiye aapka kaun sa product line abhi add karne wale hain. Kyunki last do teen mahine se aap bol rahe hain ki aapko new product update karna hai.

Customer: Haan haan hum wohi cheez hum bol rahe hain. Abhi humne decide nahi kiya. Abhi dusre ek to buyer mein kaam kar rahe hain humne.

Executive: Hmm hmm.

Customer: Aur aur waha pe ek do mahina aur lagega. Waha se aur lagenge.

Executive: To mahine aur lagenge.

Customer: Haan ek do mahina aur lagega. Uske baad mein maine aapka yaha pe update karaunga maine ekdum permanently kaam karenge humne.

Executive: Achcha sir to kyunki na dekhiye main aapko isliye inform karna chahti hu kyunki aapka next month na sir renewal bhi hai.

Customer: Achcha.

Executive: To matlab ye uss samay haan uss samay matlab fir aap ye mat boliyega ki sir mam mere ko business nahi aaya hai. Maine nahi renewal karwana. Kyunki hum aapko isliye. Main to zero product hai na mere kuch product hi nahi hai aap se koi response nahi aaya kaise main bolunga aapko. Wahi cheez hai. Koi sawal paida nahi hota hai. Main jab product dalunga uske baad mein.

Executive: Sir to ek do mahine to sir jyada ho jayenge. Koshish kariye ki ek matlab agle mahine tak ka kyunki iska renewal bhi hum process kar lenge aur aapki profile mein products bhi add kar lenge.

Customer: Agla mahina April tak na?

Executive: Haan ji sir.

Customer: Kaun sa mahine tak bole aapne?

Executive: December tak sir.

Customer: December tak dekhte hain dekhte hain abhi hum kuch bol nahi pa rahe hain. Hum dekhte hain November to khatam ho hi raha hai. Haan November to sir aaj hi khatam ho hi jayega. Haan to wohi main aapko inform isiliye maine aapko na pre inform karna jaruri samjha taki aapke paas bhi ye rahe ki hamari team ne aur humne aapko sari cheeze guide kar di hai. Kyunki aisa na ho at the time of ye ki humne aapko kuch bataya nahi sir.

Customer: Haan achchi baat hai mere ko malum hai. Main theek hai main agla mahina main agla mahina hoga hoga agla mahina kareeb 15 20 25 tarikh tak aap call kariye mere ko hum baat karte hain. Theek hai?

Executive: Achcha agle mahine 20 25 tarikh tak theek hai sir main aapko inform kar deti hu jaise ki abhi matlab aapke bhi dimag mein sari cheeze honi chahiye. Abhi jo aapka renewal ka price hai sir woh hum as an offer aapko 28000 plus GST offer kar sakte hain closing offer hai. Aage wale samay mein jo aap next month karoge sir to 32000 plus GST hoga.

Customer: Theek hai theek hai koi baat nahi. Theek hai.

Executive: Haan haan koi baat nahi sir main aapko isiliye inform kar rahi hu aapke end se kaun handle karega sir services ko aap karoge ya koi staff rakhoge aap?

Customer: Nahi main main khud handle karta hu fir aage jaake staff rakhne ka bandobast karunga abhi. Abhi sab kuch main hi handle kar raha hu maine.

Executive: Achcha achcha aap hi karoge sir to kuch idea hai sir ki aap kaun se product isme update karne wale hain taki main ye.

Customer: Dhoondhenge dhoondhenge humne humne abhi kuch decide nahi kiya hai. Hum karenge humne.

Executive: Achcha koi baat nahi aur isme secondary number sir kaun kiska added hai last mein 297 hai?

Customer: Kaun sa ye number?

Executive: Nahi is number pe to hamari baat ho rahi hai last mein aapka jo number hai jis se baat ho rahi hai woh 621 hai.

Customer: Haan haan.

Executive: Aur abhi ek aur number aapke profile mein added hai sir last mein 297 hai.

Customer: Woh mera hoga ya to fir mere ladka ka hoga aur kya.

Executive: Achcha do number hai to sir abhi as of now matlab aapko hum isi number pe connect karenge whatsapp pe bhi aapko. Haan haan isi number pe connect kariye mil jayega aapko. Theek hai main aapko isi mein drop karti hu aur sir aapka ye concern open hai jo na ki aap active nahi ho aur aapke paas zero products hain to main isko as of now close kar rahi hu kyunki aapne bola abhi aapko time lagega ek mahine ke andar approximately aap products vagera update karoge then hum isme is topic pe discuss kar lenge. Theek hai? Abhi main abhi main isko close kar rahi hu aapke paas feedback jayega sir to usme aap usme yes or good satisfied provide kariiyega according to your satisfaction. Okay?

Customer: Sure sure sure sure. Okay sir thank you so much have a nice day sir.

Executive: Okay thank you sir.

Executive: Bye bye sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Zero products listed on the customer's profile.

- Customer's profile has no visibility.

- Customer's renewal is due next month.



Resolution:

- Executive informed about zero products in profile.

- Executive informed about profile renewal.

- Executive pre-informed about renewal price changes.

- Executive closed the concern regarding zero products.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will update products in a month.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- products, renewal, profile, visibility
